main event: A disc-shaped metallic object was observed hovering in the sky for approximately 45 minutes by two separate witnesses in Adrian, Michigan.
interesting points: The object had a light pink or white color and was estimated to be 30 to 40 feet in diameter., It had a dark, shadowy trail or exhaust behind it., The object moved horizontally, sometimes accelerating rapidly and disappearing to the east., The sky was clear and cloudless at the time of the sighting., Witnesses reported that the object could not have been a conventional aircraft.
witness description: Observers sitting in a car who noticed the object moving in a peculiar manner.
